RangeIn.description: Distance from object before it spawns

RangeOut.description: Distance from object before it despawns

FirstSpeed.description: The starting speed of the jump board.

OutOfControl.description: The amount of time after Sonic can be controlled again.

KeepVelocityDistance.description: The distance the player will keep the first speed for.

IsChangeCameraWhenPathChange.description: Does the camera change when paths change?

OutOfParkour.description: The amount of time after Sonic can parkour again.
